<p>I am an interdisciplinary Environmental Economist working at the intersection of research, consulting, and applied technology. I split my time between academic research and consulting/startup work, using data science, economics, and AI to address climate and sustainability challenges. My background includes a PhD in Economics, prior service as a U.S. Air Force Civil Engineer, and years of experience working across a variety of disciplines.</p>
